title: Houschka Rounded
content:
Houschka Rounded is released this week.

It is very comprehensive with multi-lingual coverage, featuring a standard character set, contextual and stylistic alternates, lining and old-style numbers, both proportional and tabular, small caps, and 3 extra stylistic sets (as shown on the pdf).

Houschka Rounded has six weights ranging from a very thin Thin to Extra Bold.

The Thin style may be the thinnest rounded (terminals) font ever! Magnify the 5-spread pdf and have a look.

[Houschka Rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015212931/http:/www.type.co.uk/pdfpreview/F007329.pdf)
author: Nick Cooke

comments.content: I love all of the options available through stylistic sets. A couple of clicks and, voila, an new personality emerges! Well done.
